summary: Build an app related to Radha Krishna.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Radha and Krishna elegant line-art emblem logo on transparent background (rk-emblem.dim_512x512.png)
- Warm devotional home hero background illustration with subtle lotus and mandala motifs, no text (rk-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Set of 6 square devotional gallery illustrations featuring Radha-Krishna silhouettes and floral/lotus patterns, cohesive style, no text (rk-gallery-set-1.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Set of 6 square devotional gallery illustrations featuring peacock feather motifs and temple arches, cohesive style, no text (rk-gallery-set-2.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a cohesive Radha–Krishna devotional visual theme and apply it consistently across the app (colors, typography, spacing, backgrounds, components). Use a warm, traditional palette (e.g., saffron, marigold, deep green, cream) and avoid blue/purple as the primary brand colors.
Implement core navigation with a responsive layout and the following pages: Home, Quotes, Gallery, Prayers, and My Favorites (visible after sign-in).

Add curated Radha–Krishna devotional content in English for offline use: (a) a Quotes page that lists at least 30 short devotional quotes, and (b) a Prayers page with at least 5 prayer/chant entries (title + text).
Enable users to favorite/unfavorite quotes and prayers, and view them in a My Favorites page. Persist favorites per authenticated user in the backend.
Frontend: Integrate backend favorites using React Query (queries + mutations) with loading, error, and empty states on relevant screens.
Create a Gallery page that displays a grid of devotional images (static assets) with a full-screen/lightbox view when an image is clicked.
Add generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., hero background on Home and items in Gallery).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an app for/related to Radha Krishna (devotional-themed app).

Backend: Implement a single Motoko actor API to store and retrieve per-user favorites for quotes and prayers (identified by stable IDs). Include methods to get favorites, add favorite, remove favorite, and clear all favorites for the caller.
